TopicTitle: Your avatar is stuck in an elevator with the above poster's avatar, what do you do?

Articles.Content: I.. just... what?
I didn't see you get on. (half-life anyone?)
Yeah, how did Gordon 'wake up' on the tram to City 17?

Yeah, how did Gordon 'wake up' on the tram to City 17?

get out of the elevator you silly brony

Also, my avatar is a vacuum. (like space:P)

@Galacticruler

*Snif *Snif

"I smell the delicate odor of an Hater"

P.S. Lol, explosive decompression!
What kind of of gun is that?
you look Minecraftish

Why everybody want to know what kind of gun I'm using? It's just a Revolver.

(you didn't seen the barrel?)

P.S. What is writh in the meme that you use as an avatar.
It looks more like a hair dryer actually.

you look familiar....

(Pample) I use the Ancient Aliens Meme (or in Twilight's case, Ancient magic Meme) I'm not saying it's Magic, but it's magic.
Damn, somebody noticed my fake gun!
Wait, you are from Metal slug 3, right? OH GOD HOW I USED TO LOVE THAT GAME. NOSTALGIAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

Metal Slug is a good game, but I only played the fourth sequel

(or the one where the 2th level have zombies in it)

(I just find a wierd video on youtube : http://youtu.be/brROj0Y95SU (I've got only one clue for you, ponies and pies))
I've seen enough Half R34 to know why Soarin's wings folded out...

Some hater say that ponies are homosexual... now they're right

*Cought *Cought

Nice... Nice wheather today, no?
Nah, If you call storms and rain nice, then i guess.....
Huh ... Are you a ninja?
Yes. I have been here the whole time.
I'm assuming you are a corgi ninja
Oh no! That's a pony again !
Wait, I thought this was the pony free elevator :/ And yes im a Corgi Ninjeh

Pony-free? You come on the KSP game forum expecting it to be pony-free? you come from pluto or what? this is the 20%-cooler elevator! And we, the majors poster, are almost all brony, me being one of the exceptions.
urm... I'm actually an Anthropomorphic Pony, but whatever...
Bah, well it seems im stuck in here anyhow. Anyways does anyone know where this is going?
As in the elevator.
